Hadj Smaine Mohamed Seghir (29 Ọktoba 1932 - 6 Septemba 2021) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-eme egwuregwu nke amụrụ n'afọ 1932 na Constantine, Algeria, France.
Maazị Hadj Smaine tinyere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 70 nke ndụ ya na ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Nzọụkwụ mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri ndị ọkachamara bụ na Paris Opera ebe ọ nyeere onye edemede egwuregwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jean Vilar aka
Ya na ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na'ihe nkiri Henri Corderaux, Rene Fontanel, André Croq, Phillipe Dauchet, na Pierre Vial rụkọkwara ọrụ ogologo oge
N'oge njem ihe nkiri na South nke mba France, ọ ga-ezute nnukwu ihe nkiri ọzọ: Allel Mouhib, ha abụọ ga-aghọ ndị enyi na ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ
Ha ga-ahụ, ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị Circa afọ 1962-63, Algeria National Theatre yana National School of Dramatic Arts tinyere onye nwụrụ anwụ Mahieddine Bechtarzi na Mustapha Kateb
Ọ bụ onye kwere ekwe siri ike na nnwere onwe nke ndị Algeria, ya mere o sonyere na nzuzo n'ọgụ megide ndị French Colonial n'afọ ndi 1950

N'oge ọdachi nke Agha Algiers (La Bataille dī Alger) n'etiti afọ 50, ndị Parachutists nke General Massu ga-ejide ya (Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye - onye mmekọ nke Algeria Revolutionary Larbi Benmhidi na Autonomous Zone Autonome nke Algiers ga-ata ahụhụ otu afọ ka e mesịrị na Casbah) ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ tụfuo ndụ ya n'okpuru mmekpa ahụ na Casino de la Corniche tupu ọ ghọgbu ọnwụ ma gbapụ site n'enyere ya site n'onyere ya site na enyemaka nke onye nkuzi ihe nkiri ya nke onye Algeria nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ (na French Cordereaux)

Na mbido afọ 60, Maazị Hadj Smaine ga-eji nkwanye ùgwù jụ ọkwa dị iche iche nke Minista na onye nnọchi anya n'oge ọchịchị nke ndị isi ala Benbella na Boumedienne iji tinye oge na ume ya n'ịhazi na ịzụ ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu nke ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na ndị nduzi, yana ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na-akọ akụkọ & ga-abụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ụlọ ihe nkiri, na telivishọn a ama ama, nke gụnyere Gilo PNNNN'Ocececece, The Imaghers of Al Al Al Ally Les Les Les Les Pl Pl Pl Plugriaz Les Les Les L'Odesdesdesdes, Les Les Les Rom Rom Rom Rom, Les Les Pl
Njikọ ikpeazụ ya ga-abụ na nwa ya nwoke n'ime afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya

Ọ ga-enye ndụmọdụ na nduzi bara uru na ihe nkiri nke nwa ya nwoke duziri, ya bụ, ọ bụ, ọ bụkwa nna ya bụ isi, na, na, ọ na-enye ụfọdụ n'ime aro ndị kachasị ọhụrụ banyere ihe odide na ọnọdụ ha - Ihe nkiri niile kwadoro ndị na-enweghị ihe, ndị na-abaghị uru ma nye ndị mbịarambịa na ndị ka nta olu
Mgbe a gwara ya ka ọ sonye na mmepụta ndị ahụ dịka onye isi mmepụta maka ihe nkiri atọ ahụ, ọ nabatara ma jụ kpamkpam ka a kwụọ ya ụgwọ maka onyinye ya na-ekwu na ọ na-eme ya maka ihe kwesịrị ekwesị
Maazị Hadj Smaine na nwa ya nwoke (Film Director & Actor Anouar H
Smaine) rụsiri ọrụ ike ruo ọtụtụ afọ na edemede ọzọ maka ihe nkiri a ga-agba na obodo ya nke Constantine iji nyere aka mee ka Cinema Algeria dịghachi ndụ

Ọ kpọbatara ezigbo enyi ya; onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Abdelhamid Habbati ma chekwaa ebe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị gburugburu obodo ahụ mara mma na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Arab & Ottoman Quarters (Souika) oge ochie - Ọrụ nrọ ha iji sọpụrụ obodo Constantine oge ochie na ndị ya yiri ka ọ dị nso na a ga-enweta - n'ụzọ dị mwute, n'ihi ihe isi ike nchịkwa dị egwu, emeghị ihe nkiri ahụ
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Maazị Habbati (onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọrụ ahụ) ga-agafe Maazị Hadj Smaine sochiri n'ọnwa Septemba 5, afọ 2021 na Los Angeles, CA
N'oge ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, Maazị Hadj Smaine gbara nwunye ya na ụmụ ya gburugburu
E liri ya na Los Angeles, California.
